name: Mommy Maze: Scary Labyrinth
description:
Welcome to the new scary puzzle game! Let's play Mommy Maze and help Mommy to clean up. Help Mommy to solve the maze and find the toy while playing interesting levels with labyrinths full of obstacles & scary things. Avoid the obstacles and complete levels by stretching the character's arms and legs. Mommy has really long arms and legs – just like ropes! They are suitable for any labyrinth!

Game features:

— Spooky Mommy
— Labyrinths, mazes, puzzles, brainteasers for everyone’s taste
— Mommy can crawl the walls!
— One finger to stretch legs or arms
— Multiple unique level
— High quality graphics and sound
— Step by step increasing difficulty
— Smooth animation when you stretch it.
— FREE & EASY TO PLAY

In the Mommy Maze game there are dozens of mazes, where you need to avoid treacherous obstacles, solve challenging puzzles and find the toy. Time to play for Mommy!
